sentences.name: Narator
sentences.sentence: The room is dark, Will goes inside, closes the door, and goes towards the living room without turning on the lights.

sentences.name: Narator
sentences.sentence: The place is messy and has not been cleaned in a while.

sentences.name: Narator
sentences.sentence: Will only uses this as a place to sleep but since work was not as tiring today, he did not collapse like he usually would.

sentences.name: Narator
sentences.sentence: So, Will sits on the couch in the living room, hoping if he sits down maybe he can sleep and forget everything.

sentences.name: Narator
sentences.sentence: The room is so silent that you probably can hear a pin drop.

sentences.name: Narator
sentences.sentence: Many months ago, this room would not have been this silent, because Anna would be cooking or watching the TV.

sentences.name: Narator
sentences.sentence: Anna would welcome Will home everyday because she was always home first.

sentences.name: Narator
sentences.sentence: Will feels like time is moving so slowly whenever he comes back home, he looks at the kitchen and reminisces about what it was like when Anna was still in this world
